    @when(parsers.parse('{ota_type} OTA {light_name} to {version} when it is {action}'))
    def device_fw_ota(target, ota_type, light_name, version, action):
        print("***************************")
        print(light_name)
        print("***************************")
    
        # get the device current status before ota
        state_before_ota = get_dut_status(target, light_name)
    
        # get the device current status before ota
        version_before_ota = get_dut_version(target, light_name)
    
        # trigger fw ota
        if ota_type == "Auto":
            target.mqtt.device_ota(light_name, version)
        elif ota_type == "Force":
            target.mqtt.device_force_ota(light_name, version)
